dependencies.description:
Node.js is an open-source, cross-platform JavaScript runtime
environment.
dependencies.name: node-js

dependencies.description: npm: A package manager for javascript.
dependencies.name: npm

dependencies.description:
A small Python module for determining appropriate platform-specific
dirs, e.g. a "user data dir".
dependencies.name: py-appdirs

dependencies.description:
MarkupSafe is a library for Python that implements a unicode string that
is aware of HTML escaping rules and can be used to implement automatic
string escaping. It is used by Jinja 2, the Mako templating engine, the
Pylons web framework and many more.
dependencies.name: py-markupsafe

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description: Data validation and settings management using Python type hinting.
dependencies.name: py-pydantic

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: The blessed package to manage your versions by scm tags.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools-scm

dependencies.description:
The typing_extensions module contains both backports of these changes as
well as experimental types that will eventually be added to the typing
module, such as Protocol (see PEP 544 for details about protocols and
static duck typing).
dependencies.name: py-typing-extensions

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

description:
An adaptation of the popular mkdocs-material theme for the Sphinx
documentation tool.
name: py-sphinx-immaterial

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
